summary: Experienced Director with a demonstrated history of working in the  health care industry. Skilled in Research, Microsoft Excel, Stong Media  Outreach, Customer Service, Management, and Microsoft Word. Strong arts and design professional studied Anatomy and physiology - Raritan Valley Community College

currentPositions.description: Creating a diverse and dynamic calendar of programs and excursions to enrich the lives of the seniors at Brandywine Living. Holding a consistent and strong relationship with residents family members, sending photos , emails & videos of their families engaged and enjoying life. Excellent relationship with community members including Senior Centers, First Responders and Food Bank by organizing fund raisers to help non profits. Engaging  Princeton Seniors annually to help our communities Food Bank by planting, maintaining and harvesting a vegetable garden, all vegetables are donated to local Food Banks. Developed an exceptional relationship with local TV and media outlets that include Nj.Com, The Princeton Packet, Centraljersey.com, The Washington Post, McKnight’s Senior Living, ABC, ABC World News and News 12 New Jersey. This relationship helps to provide free press of interesting and unique programs that are held at Brandywine Communities. This has helped Market our Communities and promote sales.
currentPositions.title: Escapades Producer ( Activities Director )

headline:

ingestedContentSummary.description: SOUTH BRUNSWICK, N.J. (PIX11) – Four veterans in New Jersey thought they were simply going to be recognized for their service. What ended up happening was a little bit more. Eugene Holl…
ingestedContentSummary.title: New Jersey veterans surprised with medals for their service

message.text: We had an amazing #WOWMOMENT at Brandywine Princeton . Four of our Veterans were surprised with medals for their service . Please check out the touching story on Pix11

ingestedContentSummary.title: 🎶✨ Celebrating amazing women worldwide in song this International Women's Day! 🌍 Here, we feature the iconic anthem 'I Am Woman,' a powerful symbol of profound change that resonates decades after its release in 1971. 🌸👩‍🎤 Singing along to the empowering words – 'I am strong, I am invincible, I am woman!' Happy International Women's Day! 💪🌸 #InternationalWomensDay #IAmWoman | Brandywine Livi
